name: personal-website-react
description: Professional consulting website built with Next.js 15 and React 19. Features server-side rendering, static site generation, and SEO-optimized routing.

scripts.deploy: next build && touch out/.nojekyll && npx gh-pages -d out --dotfiles

comments.dev: Starts Next.js development server with hot-reload at localhost:3000
comments.build: Creates optimized production build with static HTML export in /out directory
comments.export: Alias for build - generates static site for deployment
comments.deploy: Full deployment pipeline: builds site, adds .nojekyll for GitHub Pages, deploys to gh-pages branch
comments.start: Runs production server (not needed for static export, use for testing production build)
comments.lint: Runs ESLint to check code quality and catch potential issues
